metadata.Title: CVE-2023-40305 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
GNU indent 2.2.13 has a heap-based buffer overflow in search_brace in indent.c via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-40305` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

indent - 2.2.12-1ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: indent package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.12-1ubuntu0.20.04.1').
